name: df-wlim
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cwlim(c0, c1), crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cinf(c1, c1, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), csup(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c1, c0)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ WLim(c0, c1)= { s0 ∈ c1 |(s0 ≠ inf(c1, c1, c0)∧ s0 = sup(Pred(c0, c1, s0), c1, c0))}
comment: Define the class of limit points of a well-founded set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)
